item.title: Free time
item.description: Scout I spend a lot of time as a scout leader (volunteer) for the local group of AGESCI. I joined the Scout Movement as a teenager and I’ve been a scout leader since end of 2015. I think the ideas of Baden Powell (as they are implemented in Italy, at least) are an effective way to train boys and girls in many aspects of life. No one can pass through life, any more than he can pass through a bit of country, without leaving tracks behind, and those tracks may often be helpful to those coming after him in finding their way.

item.title: Personal CV
item.description: Andrea Agnolin’s short web version resumé Updated fall 2025 Education Master Sc. degree in Mathematics at Università degli Studi di Padova, 2021, 108/110, Padua(IT) Erasmus exchange at Universität Bayreuth, 2018, Bayreuth(DE) Bachelor Sc. degree in Mathematics at Università degli Studi di Padova Scuola Galileiana di Studi Superiori in Padua, first 2 years of university Liceo “F. Corradini” high school, Thiene(IT) High School Awards at Italian national level of Math, Physics and Infomatics Olimpiads Work Experience Quantitive Analyst and Full-Stack developer at Phinergy 2021-2025+ We mainly develop SaaS integrated webapps for business customers in the energy sector.
